title: Technical Architect
location: Ho Chi Minh City, Viet Nam
description: Coordinating requirements, schedules, and activities; contributing to team meetings; troubleshooting development and production problems.

Researching and developing application base on Machine learning and Deep learning. Such as web application for classifying customer 's mail , clustering company 's documents and mobile application for checking posture.

title: Senior Developer

Most of the mobile projects are native implementations in XCode (iOS, Objective-C or Swift), Android Studio (Android, Java) or React Native; the web projects are created using PHP and Node.js.
